titles.title: The Savior Can Solve Every Problem (nice easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Savior can solve ev'ry problem The tangles of life can undo There is nothing to hard for Jesus There is nothing that He cannot do{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Savior can lift ev'ry burden The heavy as well as the light His strength is made perfect in weakness In Him there is power and might{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Savior can bear every sorrow In Him there is comfort and rest No matter how great the affliction He only permits what is best{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Savior can strengthen the weary His grace is sufficient for all He knows every step of the pathway And listens to hear when we call{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Savior can break sin's dominion The vict'ry He won long ago In Him there is freedom from bondage He's able to conquer the foe{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Savior can satisfy fully The heart that the world cannot fill His presence will sanctify wholly The soul that is yielded and still{/lang-eng}
